data.actual_result: You are unable to scroll down and view the last options
data.expected_result: You should be able to scroll down and view the last options
data.short_description: You can't scroll down in the long press menu for channels while using landscape mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Got to a channel you have at least Manage Channels permission for - Switch to landscape mode - Press hold on the channel and wait for the menu to show up - Notice that you are unable to scroll down to view the last options on the list
